.venv-audit/.description: Audit tools installed in .venv-audit/ virtual environment. Run tools via: ./.venv-audit/bin/python -m ruff, ./.venv-audit/bin/python -m pylint, ./.venv-audit/bin/python -m vulture. Versions: ruff 0.14.10, pylint 4.0.4, vulture 2.14, pip_audit 2.10.0, pytest-cov 7.0.0

ai-orchestrator/backend/auth.py.description: Fixed datetime.utcnow() deprecation warning (Python 3.12+). All 4 occurrences replaced with datetime.now(timezone.utc): create_access_token (2x), create_refresh_token (1x), create_api_key (1x). Import updated to include timezone from datetime module.

ai-orchestrator/backend/main.py.description: Pylint score 8.20/10. Main issues: 19 unused imports, 92 total issues, module too large (1425 lines vs 1000 limit). High complexity in react_loop functions.

ai-orchestrator/backend/requirements.txt.description: pip-audit found 6 vulnerabilities in 4 packages: 1) python-multipart 0.0.12 (CVE-2024-53981 DoS) - upgrade to 0.0.18, 2) python-jose 3.3.0 (PYSEC-2024-232, PYSEC-2024-233 algorithm confusion + JWT bomb) - REMOVE (deprecated, spec says use PyJWT only), 3) starlette 0.38.6 transitive (CVE-2024-47874, CVE-2025-54121 DoS) - upgrade to 0.47.2, 4) ecdsa 0.19.1 transitive from python-jose (CVE-2024-23342 timing attack) - no fix, removing python-jose resolves this.

ai-orchestrator/backend/.description: Vulture dead code analysis: 0 issues at 100% confidence, 11 unused imports at 90% confidence (engine.py:1, main.py:7, services/rag/reranker.py:1, tests/test_security.py:1). Most 60% confidence results are false positives: FastAPI endpoints, pytest fixtures, Pydantic config attributes, dynamically-loaded tool functions, and watchdog event handlers.

.auto-claude/specs/003-corrections/AUDIT.description: Comprehensive security audit report created with categorized findings: 3 CRITICAL (SQL injection auth.py:327, datetime.utcnow() x4, mktemp), 8 HIGH (python-jose 2 CVEs, python-multipart CVE, starlette 2 CVEs, ecdsa CVE, S324 hash, Pylint 8.20 target 9.0, Ruff config, hardcoded passwords), 15 MEDIUM (Docker root user, no resource limits, code complexity). Remediation plan included.

ai-orchestrator/backend/auth.py.backup.2.description: Backup of auth.py created before CRITICAL SQL injection fix (line 327). Original file is 17924 bytes. Backup path is ai-orchestrator/backend/ not just backend/ as referenced in subtask.
